info.name: Couchtuner, Minimal Elegance ~
info.description:
This is based on my other style, Couchtuner, Elegant ~

The difference is that this one aims to be even more minimal by hiding the list of shows on the right and by making the video players larger so as to increase viewing comfort without having to enter fullscreen. Disqus comments are still displayed, because I like reading comments after I've watched something.
